verbLexeme: 1. To gamble on a poker machine; to play a poker machine. Informal Australian English = play the pokies.
nominalLexeme: 1. A machine used for gambling. You put in a coin and then pull a lever (on old machines) or press buttons (on new machines) to try and get particular patterns of symbols on a screen in order to win money. Australian English = poker machine, pokies.
oldEntry: Popular explanation: pulling the lever on a poker machine.
